settings.text:
Please note our shipping policy as follows:

We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

  • Inside Dhaka delivery within 03 working days
  • Outside Dhaka delivery within 05 working days
  • Inside Dhaka delivery fee is 100 Taka
  • Outside Dhaka Delivery fee is 200 Taka

Note: *If the weight increase, the charge will change accordingly.

After you receive the shipment, our delivery team will wait for 10 minutes to let you check on the product. If you have any issue with the product, you can contact our Customer Services Department and return the product instantly. 

Please note that we are associated with a shipping company to deliver orders. Hence, the delivery process is not completely in our control. We apologize for occurrence of any damage & promise to compensate for it.
